Others: The Timberwolves were lifeless for the duration of their 110-103 season-opening loss to the Lakers.
Anthony Davis looked like the best player on the floor at both ends, with his motor putting Minnesota to shame.
Minnesota had no defensive edge, was beat up and down the floor and were, frankly, very easy to play against on both ends of the floor.
The Wolves trailed by 19 in the first half.
Anthony Edwards scored 27 points, but required 25 shots to do so.
Minnesota committed 16 giveaways that led to 19 points for the Lakers.
The 2023-24 Timberwolves made the opponent earn everything with their harassing defense that never gave even an inch.
On Tuesday, Minnesota was lackadaisical from the outset.
Defensive lapses and apparent miscommunication was evident as Lakers players were left largely uncontested.
Los Angeles ended up with fastbreak layups fresh off Minnesota made buckets.
